tool_description: The Domain and DNS Info Checker API is your comprehensive solution for all things related to domain and DNS information. This user-friendly API offers four versatile endpoints to cater to your needs: IANA Top Level Domains, Domain DNS details, Domain "WhoIs" information, and Domain availability checks. Whether you're managing domains, building a DNS tool, or conducting domain research, this API has you covered at an affordable price.
name: Domain and DNS Info Checker
title: Domain and DNS Info Checker

api_list.name: IANA TLDs
api_list.description: Provides a list of all valid and registered TLDs from iana.org
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-and-dns-info-checker.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/tlds"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-and-dns-info-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Domain DNS info
api_list.description: Provides DNS records of a provided domain(A, AAAA,PTR,CNAME,MX,TXT,SOA)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-and-dns-info-checker.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/dns/google.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-and-dns-info-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-and-dns-info-checker.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/dns/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-and-dns-info-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Domain 'Who Is' info
api_list.description: Provides 'Who is' info of a provided Domain

api_list.name: Check Domain
api_list.description: Checks if a Domain is registered or available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-and-dns-info-checker.p.rapidapi.com/api/v2/domain/rapidapi.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-and-dns-info-checker.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
